sentence.Network_en: I believe everyone is innately psychic.
sentence.Network_cn: 我相信每个人天生都有超自然的能力。

sentence.Network_en: Innately conservative, Confucius was fascinated by the last of these disciplines.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于生性保守, 孔子特别推崇“礼”.

sentence.Network_en: Different individuals are innately fitted for different kinds of employment.
sentence.Network_cn: 不同的人适合不同的职业,这是天生的.

1.2 对“天赋观念”（innate ideas）的批判有人认为至少有些观念是天赋的，它们构成证明上帝存在的先决条件。 有人举例证明天赋观.

entry.def: An innate quality or ability is one which a person is born with.

example.ex: Americans have an innate sense of fairness.
example.tran: 美国人有一种天生的公平观。

example.ex: ...a society in which individuals could develop their innate abilities and capacities.
example.tran: 个人可以发挥其天生才干和能力的社会

sentences.sentence: "the child is said to be innately disposed to learn language"
